short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Various fixes & improvements to reddit interface

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fixed image album viewer where images did not fit on the page despite container being small.

Too lazy to click on the sub list and scroll all the way to the bottom, or whatever new place the frontend devs have decided to hide it? r all button will ensure you have a convenient button for this redirect.

The button is added adjacent to the r/popular button, because that is likely never going to stop existing.

The code is available at https://github.com/chordanlarock/bagel-reddit-ex
